overview: Film tells the story of the late Qin Dynasty and the early Han Dynasty. The Qin Dynasty sent Zhao Tuo to the south to fight in Baiyue. Zhao Tuo regretted that he had killed. For the sake of people he broke his sword, stopped fighting and seeking peace.  In the end he become King of Nanyue, and with Han and Vietnamese people created a glorious history of harmonious future for Nanyue.
title: Legend of Nanyue
